<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Stops a running agent

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"agentId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"ID of the agent to stop"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
